alert.note: Alert for Duplin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Onslow and Duplin Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1044 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Kornegay to near Kenansville to near Bowdens. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wallace, Warsaw, Kornegay, Rose Hill, Beulaville, Cypress Creek, Bowdens, Kenansville, Chinquapin, Potters Hill, Albertson, Sarecta, Magnolia, Greenevers, Lyman and Teachey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
